XWT - xtremewrestlingtorrents net, a private tracker, i'm member to as too are many other wrestling fans.

Usually sign ups are closed until after PPV's to avoid hit and runs by casual members.

But for future reference, when member, you can go to profile and be alerted via email when a chosen catagory has torrents added, so when selecting TNA PPV's you'd get email notification of every instance upped on XWT for the current TNA PPV, likewise WWE etc.

Waiting on an XviD or MP4 myself. : )

Would prefer to wait a bit and download the bigger file that Rudos provides.  The higher res simply makes for an even better viewing experience.
Its about the best compromise between size and viewing clarity.
